info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:34PM PDT until July 28 at 10:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM PDT FOR CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 934 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Southern Highlands, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Surface wind observations. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, Anthem, Summerlin, Mountains Edge, The Strip, Nellis AFB, Downtown Las Vegas, East Las Vegas, Sam Boyd Stadium, Southern Highlands, Spring Valley, Green Valley, Enterprise, Paradise, Lone Mountain, Lake Las Vegas, Sloan and Seven Hills. This includes Interstate 15 in Nevada between mile markers 20 and 25. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
